# custom-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                    | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Card disabled - this is used for matched cards | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `image`    | `image`    | Image for card                                 | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `open`     | `open`     | Card open or closed                            | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `text`     | `text`     | Text for card                                  | `any`     | `undefined` |
